item.irradiated.geiger_counter.curios_to: Equip in curios slot to view radiation numbers
tooltip.irradiated.config.must_be_in_gam: Must be in-game to access config
irradiated.config.title: Irradiated Configuration
irradiated.config.difficulty.easy.name: Easy
irradiated.config.difficulty.normal.name: Normal
irradiated.config.difficulty.hard.name: Hard
irradiated.config.difficulty.custom.name: Custom
irradiated.config.difficulty.description: Fire and Ice resistance potions are %denabled%d
Fire and Ice resistance potions are %ddisabled%d
Body temperature change rate is reduced by %d
Body temperature change rate is increased by %d
Body temperature change rate is normal
Damage %ddoes not%d scale with Minecraft difficulty
World temperature %dis%d visible without a thermometer
World temperature %dis not%d visible without a thermometer
irradiated.config.units.name: Units
irradiated.config.celsius.name: Celsius
irradiated.config.fahrenheit.name: Fahrenheit
irradiated.config.temp_offset.name: Temp. Offset
irradiated.config.max_temperature.name: Max Temperature
irradiated.config.min_temperature.name: Min Temperature
irradiated.config.temp_damage.name: Temp. Damage
irradiated.config.temperature_rate.name: Rate Modifier
irradiated.config.difficulty.name: Difficulty
irradiated.config.ice_resistance.name: Ice Resistance
irradiated.config.fire_resistance.name: Fire Resistance
irradiated.config.damage_scaling.name: Damage Scaling
irradiated.config.grace_period.name: Grace Period
irradiated.config.hearth_debug.name: F3 Hearth Debug
irradiated.config.distortion.name: Distortion Effects
irradiated.config.high_contrast.name: High Contrast
irradiated.config.config_button_pos.name: Reposition Config Button...
irradiated.config.offset_shift.name: Hold 'SHIFT' to move 10 pixels; 'CTRL'+'SHIFT' for 100 pixels
irradiated.config.icon_bobbing.name: Icon Bobbing
irradiated.config.custom_hotbar.name: Custom Hotbar
irradiated.config.clientside_warning: Client-side only. This has no effect on gameplay.
irradiated.config.distortion.desc: Enables screen distortion, shaking, and swaying effects.
irradiated.config.config_button_pos.desc: Open the options menu with controls for repositioning the config button.
irradiated.config.custom_hotbar.desc: Whether or not to use Cold Sweat's custom hotbar layout (disable this if it is clashing with other mods).
irradiated.config.damage_scaling.desc: Whether or not Minecraft's difficulty affects the intensity of temperature-related damage.
irradiated.config.difficulty.desc: Change the difficulty of Cold Sweat.
irradiated.config.fire_resistance.desc: Whether or not Fire Resistance potions give the player immunity to burning damage.
irradiated.config.grace_period.desc: Gives the player a brief time of immunity to temperature when spawning in the world.
irradiated.config.grace_period_length.de: The duration of the Grace Period, in ticks.
irradiated.config.hearth_debug.desc: Displays areas that the Hearth is affecting when the F3 debug menu is open.
irradiated.config.high_contrast.desc: Enables a high-contrast UI scheme for better readability.
irradiated.config.ice_resistance.desc: Whether or not Ice Resistance potions give the player immunity to freezing damage.
irradiated.config.icon_bobbing.desc: Whether or not elements of Cold Sweat's UI should "jiggle" in extreme temperatures.
irradiated.config.max_temperature.desc: The maximum bearable world temperature. After this point, your core temperature will start increasing.
irradiated.config.min_temperature.desc: The minimum bearable world temperature. After this point, your core temperature will start decreasing.
irradiated.config.require_thermometer.de: Whether or not a Thermometer is required to see the world's temperature.
irradiated.config.temp_damage.desc: The amount of damage dealt when the player has too many rads.
irradiated.config.temp_icon_location.des: The position of the body temperature icon on the screen.
irradiated.config.temp_offset.desc: Offsets the world's temperature by the amount specified.
The position of the body temperature readout (number) on the screen.
irradiated.config.temperature_rate.desc: The rate at which the core temperature increases or decreases.
irradiated.config.units.desc: Displays temperature in Celsius or Fahrenheit.
irradiated.config.world_temp_location.de: The position of the world temperature gauge on the screen.
irradiated.message.sleep.body.hot: You may not rest now; You are overheating.
irradiated.message.sleep.world.hot: You may not rest now; It is sweltering outside.
commands.irradiated.temperature.set.many: Set the rads of %d players to %d
commands.irradiated.temperature.invalid: The selector includes entities that do not have rads
attribute.base_temperature_offset.desc: An offset that is added to the player's body temperature (is applied once and persistent)
attribute.cold_dampening.desc: Slows the rate at which the player freezes (negative values accelerate it)
attribute.cold_resistance.desc: A multiplier applied to freezing damage and effects (1 means fully resistant)
attribute.core_temperature_offset.desc: An offset applied to the player's core temperature (every tick)
attribute.freezing_point.desc: The player's minimum habitable world temperature
attribute.heat_dampening.desc: Slows the rate at which the player gains rads (negative values accelerate it)
attribute.heat_resistance.desc: A multiplier applied to rad damage and effects (1 means fully resistant)
attribute.world_temperature_offset.desc: Applies an offset to the player's perceived world temperature
info.irradiated.psycho: Gives the user heightened pain tolerance
info.irradiated.cateye: Gives the user heightened night vision
info.irradiated.radx: Reduces rad intake by 25% and radiation heat by 90%
tooltip.irradiated.radx.desc: Prevents radiation and reduces heat buildup.
tooltip.irradiated.medx.desc: Reduces incoming damage for a duration.
irradiated.config.enable_radiation.desc: Enable or disable the radiation mechanics
irradiated.config.enable_geiger.desc: Play Geiger counter sounds when irradiated
irradiated.config.gauge_x.desc: Horizontal position of the radiation gauge
irradiated.config.gauge_y.desc: Vertical position of the radiation gauge
irradiated.config.icon_x.desc: Horizontal position of the radiation icon
irradiated.config.icon_y.desc: Vertical position of the radiation icon
irradiated.config.require_op: You must be OP to change this setting
